committees.committee: House Banking, Finance, and Urban Affairs
House Banking, Finance, and Urban Affairs

official_title: A bill to provide that no Treasury note which is issued for a term of more than 3 years shall bear interest at a rate which is greater than 8 percent per annum.

summary.text: Prohibits any Treasury note which is issued after the date of the enactment of this Act and which is for a term of more than three years from bearing an interest rate which is greater than eight percent per annum.

titles.title: A bill to provide that no Treasury note which is issued for a term of more than 3 years shall bear interest at a rate which is greater than 8 percent per annum.
